segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, her mind seemingly elsewhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, water spilling onto the floor in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children behind her, their antics hidden from her view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, his hand deep in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting eagerly, her eyes wide with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman's focus on the plate is almost amusing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, a stark contrast to the indoor scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the water at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool looks like it's about to topple over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the excitement in the air, the children's joy palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water dripping down the cabinets, creating a growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
